text: The Big Sleep is a 1978 British American crime mystery movie directed by Michael Winner and is the second version of the 1939 novel of the same name by Raymond Chandler. It stars Robert Mitchum, James Stewart, Oliver Reed, Sarah Miles, Richard Boone, Candy Clark, Edward Fox, John Mills, Harry Andrews, Richard Todd and Diana Quick and was distributed by United Artists. Mitchum had also played Philip Marlowe three years earlier in the movie Farewell, My Lovely (1975 movie). Mitchum is the only actor to play the character in more than one feature film. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1978 crime movies Category:1970s mystery movies Category:British crime movies Category:British mystery movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Winner Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies set in London
title: The Big Sleep (1978 movie)
